I developed an upgrade for my machines, which consists of a principle similar to the item pusher in combination with a specialized chipset.
This system ensures that the machines expel their products or materials that are no longer needed to a side assigned as output. The assignment of this side is done using the logistics-editor.
A high quality transport chipset (high chip power) has no advantages over a normal one!
Info: Any possible differing effect is mentioned at the corresponding machine.
Info: For general information, refer to logic chipset.
